note:
Techwriter, technician, designer.

“Communism” never existed except as a label. “Capitalism" doesn't mean anything real either so I ignore it too. It was always just rich people, their minions, and their scams. It's not as complicated a problem when you realize this.

Politically I champion individual rights, social good, voting, and regicide. This can be restated as a "liberty-loving social-democratic republican”.

I avoid acronyms and -isms, but love a good ambiguous remark.
